reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of APBI 314, APBI 315.
This is a Wait List Section for APBI 414 Section 001. Students will be moved according to their priority on the waitlist if space becomes available. All queries should be directed to the Faculty of Land and Food Systems Student Services at students@landfood.ubc.ca.
description: Research seminar integrating diverse information to address global animal issues including: animal-source foods and human health, environmental impact of livestock production, trade in exotic animals.
